metadata.title: CVE-2024-42070 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:netfilter: nf_tables: fully validate NFT_DATA_VALUE on store to dataregistersregister store validation for NFT_DATA_VALUE is conditional, however,the datatype is always either NFT_DATA_VALUE or NFT_DATA_VERDICT. Thisonly requires a new helper function to infer the register type from theset datatype so this conditional check can be removed. Otherwise,pointer to chain object can be leaked through the registers.
